item.title: Riyaz Ahemed Waikar
item.description: Riyaz is a security evangelist, offensive security expert and researcher with over 9 years of experience in the Internet and web application security industry.

item.title: Sandesh Mysore Anand
item.description: An application security professional with a decade’s experience in a variety of roles including Application Security Engineer, Programmer Analyst and Security Consultant.
